1.2.0 / 2014-09-18
==================

1.1.0 / 2014-07-16
==================

1.0.10 / 2014-05-18
==================

  * bump fs-readdir-recursive, fixed #14

1.0.9 / 2014-03-31
==================

  * add url prefix option

1.0.8 / 2014-03-31
==================

  * Ensure files can be gzipped via compressible.

1.0.7 / 2014-03-26
==================
